Ketua DPRD Ngaku Tak Terima Draf Revisi Anggaran DKI 2020 dari Anies
01 Nov 2019, 00:11 by Arief Ikhsanudin
Jakarta - Saat ini rencana Kegiatan Umum Anggaran-Prioritas Plafon Anggaran Sementara (KUA-PPAS) 2020 DKI Jakarta sedang dibahas antara eksekutif dengan komisi-komisi di DPRD DKI Jakarta. Namun, Ketua DPRD DKI Jakarta Prasetio Edi Marsudi mengaku tak pernah mendapat draf revisi KUA-PPAS 2020.
Awalnya Prasetio berkomentar soal rencana anggaran yang disorot publik karena ada beberapa nilai aneh. Lalu, dia pun menyebut tidak pernah menerima salinan utuh revisi KUA-PPAS yang dimasukkan pada Oktober 2019.
"Jadi, kita minta Pak Anies jangan menyalahkan pemerintahan sebelumnya. Koreksi dulu. Kalau saya lihat, ini kan perencanaan dari Bappeda, saya sebetulnya sampai hari ini belum mendapatkan KUA-PPAS 2020 yang direvisi (Gubernur DKI Jakarta) Pak Anies," ucap Prasetio kepada wartawan Kamis (31/10/2019).
Lalu, soal keanehan anggaran ini, Prasetio meminta Anies untuk tidak menyalahkan sistem e-budgeting. Dalam sistem e-budgeting, persetujuan Anies menjadi kunci memasukkan anggaran.
"Karena sistem e-budgeting ini begitu masuk langsung mengunci. Harusnya apa-apa harus dirangkum dulu, rapatkan dengan Pak Gubernur. Dulu waktu jaman pemerintahan sebelumnya, saya (DPRD) sering diajak," kata Prasetio.
Sepengetahuan Prasetio, sistem e-budgeting menjadi tidak bisa diubah jika sudah dimasukkan anggaran. Sehingga, anggaran sangat sulit dimanipulasi.
"Karena e-budgeting pasti nggak bisa diotak-atik. Karena kalau sudah dikunci, hal-hal negatif, kalau sudah masuk nggak bisa keluar. Tapi kalau buka password-nya itu bisa, Pak Gubernur dengan TAPD (Tim Anggaran Pemerintah Daerah)," kata Prasetio.

The Chairman of the Regional Parliament said he did not accept the draft revision of the 2020 DKI Budget from Anies
Nov 01 2019, 00:11 by Arief Ikhsanudin
Jakarta - At present the DKI Jakarta Provisional Budget Ceiling (KUA-PPAS) General Activity Budget-Priority Activity Plan is being discussed between executives and commissions in the DKI Jakarta DPRD. However, the Chairperson of DKI Jakarta DPRD Prasetio Edi Marsudi claimed he had never received a draft revision of KUA-PPAS 2020.
Initially Prasetio commented on the budget plan that was highlighted by the public because there were some strange values. Then, he also said that he had never received a full copy of the revised KUA-PPAS that was submitted in October 2019.
"So, we ask Mr. Anies not to blame the previous government. Correction first. If I see, this is a plan from Bappeda, I actually haven't got the revised KUA-PPAS 2020 (DKI Jakarta Governor) Mr. Anies," Prasetio said to reporters Thursday (10/31/2019).
Then, about this budget oddity, Prasetio asked Anies not to blame the e-budgeting system. In the e-budgeting system, Anies's approval is the key to entering the budget.
"Because the e-budgeting system is immediately locked in. Nothing should be summarized first, close with the Governor. Previously in the previous administration era, I (DPRD) was often invited," Prasetio said.
To Prasetio's knowledge, the e-budgeting system cannot be changed if the budget is included. Thus, the budget is very difficult to manipulate.
"Because e-budgeting certainly cannot be tampered with. Because if it has been locked, negative things, if it is entered, it cannot go out. But if you open the password it can, Mr. Governor with the TAPD (Regional Government Budget Team)," said Prasetio.
